title: Chicken and mushroom fettucine
ingredients: ['1 tablespoon dark brown soft sugar', '2 teaspoons ground ginger', '2 teaspoons ground white pepper', '2 teaspoons dry mustard powder', '1 teaspoon salt', '1 teaspoon curry powder', '4 skinless chicken breast fillets, each cut into 4 to 5 pieces', '30g butter, melted', '200g mushrooms, chopped', '3 tablespoons tomato ketchup', '2 tablespoons chutney', '2 tablespoons Worcestershire sauce', '1 tablespoon soy sauce', '500g fresh fettuccine', '4 tomatoes, cut into wedges']
